meta.note: 連番整理済み（1-195）- 動名詞ハンドラー包括テスト対応

18.sentence: The cake is being baked by my mother.

19.sentence: The cake was eaten by the children.

44.sentence: The book which lies there is mine.

68.sentence: The book was written by a famous author.

72.sentence: The time when he arrived was late.

73.sentence: The reason why she left is unclear.

74.sentence: The way how he solved it was clever.
